issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Implement minimal Arrow Parquet writer as starting point for full writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8289](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8289). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement a minimal Arrow writer for Parquet so that RecordBatches can be written to a Parquet file. Ths initial version will only support i32 data type and separate JIRAs will be created for each data type or additional feature to support.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8289?focusedCommentId=17177149) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7319
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7319>
